results.title: Polypharmacy to Mitigate Acute and Delayed Radiation Syndromes
results.text_hl: Mitigation of @<m>DISEASE_Acute_Radiation_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054508 @@@hematopoietic-acute radiation syndrome@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Acute_Radiation_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D054508 @@@H-ARS@@@) by triple combination with and without @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.
